body: Everybody make fun of a Paladin until you need their charm immunity aura....
Talk about an op skill. XD
I think i've learn my lesson that the hentai plot doesn't always have to make sense/be realistic.
I love that the imp becomes bigger, curvier, and bustier as she drains the hero. There isn’t enough good quality breast expansion stuff out there.

You guys must be fun at dnd, constantly questioning whatever the dm is trying to do as if logic applies to a fantasy setting. High levelled or not, a person is still a person, did they just gain the ability to not feel pleasure at all when theyre high levelled? Of course not, thats even worse.
Yall, it's hentai, stfu and fap, or leave

She lost not because she fell into a power draining trap' she lost because the plot demanded it in the most bs way possible.
(your job is done so we'll take away all the power you'll need to defend your self from even the weakest of monsters even though your max level
so you can jet level drain by a level 1 succubus to get her to max level and you can't fight back because the death of the demon lord  made it that you can't use magic un till you retrain or the next one comes around in who knows how many years while you got this demon now has powerful as you once were running around who we all can presume won't give the hero a chance to get her power back and deal with her friends.
Pretty hot, but I get pissed thinking about how all the hard work put to leveling up has just been gone like that

I can't with these comments. I don't care how accurate these types of hentais may be with high leveled heros being drained by low level monsters. They're hot af and hit my every kink. I'm sure they do for a lot of other guys too.
indeed, OrnSmo. Bad writing
Let me put in perspective how dumb(even for a hentai) this is. You beat the elite 4 and then Lance. Before returning home, you have to go through a cave, only to get your starter bodied by a Zubat.
What a lucky find!

hentai/transformation/age-progression fans be like: f*ck yeah!

role players be like: this plot is dumb!

Sigh these kind of stories just makes me question the plot rather then enjoy the hentai, like oh super op fighter hero at max lvl can't overpower a lvl 1 monster why? Cause she can't use her magic cause mana is f'd up at the moment, even though she just used magic before this and she's a freaking fighter/magic fighter the author even points out she can't teleport cause she's not a wizard. But loe and behold all of a sudden she can't do anything except just stand there while being raped cause of hentai logic.
